dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Now, accept the duel. Or flee like the dirty coward you are.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: I hope you had a pleasant night. I must apologize for my curt greeting. I have business to attend to.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Aha, so you plan to dine here. This place is well known for its simple, quick, yet high-quality à la carte meals. Now, if you will excuse me, I must take my leave.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Turning in for the night, I see. Rest well.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I wouldn't call this a patrol... no. The alleys are rife with those who seek us to duel in their stead. I am simply in search of potential clients.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
In combat, every move is critical indeed... But I am of the opinion that there is one move that holds paramount importance.
A single clash, a determined thrust to impale my opponent.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Fighting multiple enemies at once is antithetical to the way we duel, yes.
But if they were to be corralled into a narrow alleyway, I am rather confident that I should have no trouble making short work of them.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
One cannot twirl their sword through every battle. Sometimes we face foes that prefer close-quarters combat, so close that our blades become unwieldy.
I would need to keep a trick up my sleeve in case of such instances.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
A duelist's greatest opportunity is when the opponent attempts a furious charge.
I can redirect that very force against them without spending much of my own energy.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: I will take my leave, if you have no further business to discuss.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Yes, it is an honor to be acknowledged by you. I will not disappoint.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I'm always ready.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Step forth, my opponent!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: ... I'm a bit preoccupied at the moment.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: A perfect distance.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hmph, predictable.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Ah, my victory.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Gah... what... a shame...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hm, that was rather straightforward.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... I wasn't expecting to duel something like this...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: A fair duel. All fell silent before this blade.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I can say with certainty that a painting of this duel would become nothing short of a masterpiece.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I suppose a proper duelist must accept when she is... beaten.
